mapper.insert: insert into recipe_rating_tb (recipe_id, user_id, rating, create_dt, update_dt) values (#{recipeId}, #{userId}, #{rating}, now(), null)
mapper.update: update recipe_rating_tb set rating = #{rating}, update_dt = now() where recipe_id = #{recipeId} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select recipe_rating_id, recipe_id, user_id, rating, create_dt, update_dt from recipe_rating_tb where recipe_id = #{recipeId} and user_id = #{userId}
select avg(rating) as avgRating, count(*) as countRating from recipe_rating_tb where recipe_id = #{recipeId}
